section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: At CyberLabs, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. Please read this policy carefully.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
section2.point4: Communication data when you contact us

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.intro: We use the information we collect to:
section3.point1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
section3.point3: Send you updates, newsletters, and promotional materials
section3.point4: Respond to your comments and questions

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
section5.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

section6.title: 6. Third-Party Services
section6.content: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our service. These third parties have access to your personal data only to perform tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.point1: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
